title: The Miracle 2: Love
occurrences: The Miracle: Love
He's great. He sent his love to all of you.
-Love, smile and be happy. -Love, smile and be happy.
We love you. You've helped everybody in this town.
Blood, revenge, love, tears, fighting... These movies have it all!
Mom, if I love someone, you won't let me marry him?
You are free to love anyone as long as he doesn't have any bad habits.
Mizgin, you deserve to fall in love. Your youth and beauty are going to waste!
Mahir, I love how Aziz's wife stands proud and tall. Now, that's true love.
Love is hard work.
If you can't do the hard work, you can't say that you have experienced true love.
Some people are destined to be with the one they love...
I know how much you love your wife.
I love you.
For the last 40 years, she has been Bahattin's only love.
...and you still love her and wait for her... It moves me.
If you love Adara that much, why didn't you marry her?
A miracle happened that day. Aziz started to get better.
I'm madly in love with you.
I'm madly in love with you.
No, my love.
Even movies don't have a love like theirs.
A person's life truly begins only when they fall in love.
Aziz, I love it when you speak like this.
This one is from a book, my love.
So, laugh, sing, dance, fall in love and live your life to the fullest...
...and the love of my life. -Which movie is that line from?
If you really love something, and put effort into it...
I know that you love your village...
-"Love Story". -No.
Blood, tears, pain, revenge, love and conflict! Our cinema has it all!
"In a world where sometimes love isn't worth a dime...
...you are the only one who places love above everything else.
What I love the most about you is your reflection on me...
I love your bravery, honesty, your purity.
I love you."
I fell in love with you too.
I used to love your goodness, now I love everything about you.
Can you love someone you haven't even talked to?
Why? Are you in love with a mute guy or something?
Cemile, love doesn't have a language, religion or nation.
-Love, smile and be happy. -Love, smile and be happy.
Cemile will fall in love with you all over again.
My miracle's name is Teacher Mahir.
